text: saying, “1:11 Write ¦ I am the Alpha and the Omega, the first and the last,” and, “Write TRWrite what yoʋ see in a book and send it to the 1:11 seven ¦ --- STseven 1:11 churches ¦ churches that are in Asia TRchurches: to Ephesus, Smyrna, Pergamum, Thyatira, Sardis, Philadelphia, and Laodicea.”
